properties.areaDesc: S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 31 at 3:40AM EST until February 1 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Duck to Oregon Inlet.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SATURDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
